intro.title: Wamkelekile kwi-SafetyHelp
intro.description: Phonononga izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezibonelelo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini kwindawo yakho yokusebenza.
welcome.title: Wamkelekile kwi-SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Iqonga lakho elithembekileyo lokhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini (OHS) eMzantsi Afrika. Sinikezela ngezixhobo ezizenzekelayo, eziphuculwe yi-AI ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko kunye nokuthobela kwimigangatho kwiindawo zokusebenza, izikolo, iicawe, kunye namacandelo angacwangciswanga. Joyina uluntu lwethu ukufikelela kwizibonelelo, iinkonzo, kunye nenkxaso eyenzelwe iimfuno zakho.
why_choose.title: Kutheni Ukhetha i-SafetyHelp yoKuthobela i-OHS?
why_choose.content: I-SafetyHelp liqabane lakho elithembekileyo lokuthobela ukhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini eMzantsi Afrika. Iqonga lethu linikezela ngothotho lwezixhobo ezibanzi ezilungiselelwe iimfuno ezizodwa zamashishini afana nokwakha, imigodi, kunye nemveliso. Ukusuka ekwenzeni iirejista zomthetho ukuya ekuqhubeni uvavanyo lomngcipheko, i-SafetyHelp yenza lula iimfuno ze-OHS ezintsonkothileyo ngeewizadi ezisebenziseka lula kunye nenkxaso yexesha langempela nge-chatbot yethu ephethwe yi-AI. Ixhaswe yimithetho yaseMzantsi Afrika kunye neendlela ezilungileyo, sinika amandla amashishini ukuba adale iindawo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo ngelixa eqinisekisa ukuthobela i-OHSA ne-COIDA. Joyina amawaka eengcali ezithembele kwi-SafetyHelp ukukhusela amaqela azo kunye nokwenza lula iinkqubo zokhuseleko.
legal_obligations.client.title: Izibophelelo zoMthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela uVavanyo lweSiseko soMngcipheko (BRA) oluchonga iingozi zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(b): Nikezela ngeNgcaciso yoKhuseleko lwezeMpilo echaza iimfuno ezithile zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(l): Yamkela iSicwangciso sezeMpilo noKhuseleko soMkhontrakthi ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Izibophelelo zoMkhontrakthi
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(a): Ngenisa iSicwangciso sezeMpilo noKhuseleko esisekelwe kwingcaciso yomthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina iFayile yoKhuseleko lwezeMpilo kwisiza esinazo zonke iingxelo ezifunekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: UMmiselo woKwakha 9: Qhuba uVavanyo loMngcipheko kunye noVavanyo lokuChonga iNgozi yoMngcipheko (HIRAs) ngokukodwa kumsebenzi.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Izibophelelo zoBuchule be-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(5): AbaSebenzeli (PrCHSA) balawula i-H&S egameni lomthengi, beqinisekisa ukuthobela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: UMmiselo woKwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) ancedisa abakhontrakthi ekuphumezeni nasekuvavanyeni iinkqubo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Imiyalelo ye-SACPCMP: Kufuneka igcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD zobume bobungcali.

wizard.step_9.description: Phonononga ukhetho lwakho kwaye yongeza amaxwebhu kwi-cart yakho ukuze uqhubeke.

resources.description: Ngaba ufuna uncedo lobuchule? Nxibelelana nabantu abavunyiweyo kwiimfuno zeprojekthi yakho.

resources.john_smith: John Smith, Igosa le-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: CHSO67890 - Unxibelelwano: john.smith@example.com

footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyiwe
chatbot.response: Ndilapha ukuze ndikuncede! Ngengcebiso ye-OHS eyenzelwe wena, nceda qhagamshelana nobuchule.
construction.title: Ukhuseleko lwezeMpilo eKwakheni
construction.description: Qinisekisa ukuthobela imimiselo yokhuseleko lwezempilo ekwakheni usebenzisa izixhobo ze-OHS ze-SafetyHelp. Izibonelelo zethu zikunceda ulawule iingozi, uthobele iimfuno zomthetho, kwaye ukhusele abasebenzi kwisiza, usebenzisa iindlela ezilungileyo ezichazwe kwi-'Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans.'
legal_appointments.title: Ukutyunjwa Okusemthethweni
legal_appointments.description: Lawula ukutyunjwa okusemthethweni kokhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini njengoko kufunwa yimithetho ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika. Sebenzisa i-organogram ukunika iindima, ugcwalise iinkcukacha zomntu otyunjiweyo, kwaye uvelise uxwebhu olubanzi olunama-leta okutyunjwa, iirekhodi zoqeqesho, kunye nolwazi olungaphezulu.
organogram.title: I-Organogram yoKutyunjwa Okusemthethweni kwe-OHS
organogram.form.name: Igama loMntu oTyunjiweyo
legislation.title: Umthetho
legislation.description: Fikelela kwithala leencwadi elibanzi lemithetho ye-OHS, imigangatho, kunye nohlaziyo. Yenza iirejista zomthetho ze-OHS, khangela imithetho ethile, kwaye uphonononge ubudlelwane phakathi kwemimiselo. Iinguqulelo ezilula ziyafumaneka ukuze uthenge ukwenza imibhalo yomthetho entsonkothileyo ifikeleleke ngakumbi.
legislation.tools.title: Izixhobo zoMthetho
legislation.updates.title: Uhlaziyo loMthetho kunye neMithetho eYiliweyo
legislation.standards.title: Imigangatho ye-OHS
services.title: Iinkonzo ze-SafetyHelp
services.description: Fumanisa uluhlu lweenkonzo zokhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini ezilungiselelwe ukuxhasa iindawo zokusebenza, izikolo, iicawe, kunye namacandelo angacwangciswanga kulo lonke elaseMzantsi Afrika. Ukusuka kwingcebiso ukuya kuqeqesho, i-SafetyHelp inikezela ngezisombululo ezilungiselelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela nokhuseleko.
services.consulting.title: Ingcebiso ye-OHS
services.consulting.description: Fumana ingcebiso yobuchule malunga nokuthobela i-OHS, ulawulo lomngcipheko, kunye nokutyunjwa okusemthethweni kubantu bethu abavunyiweyo. Sisebenze nemibutho efana ne-Anglo Platinum, ABSA, kunye ne-Metrorail ukuhambisa izisombululo ezilungiselelwe wena.
services.training.title: Iinkqubo zoQeqesho
services.training.description: Fikelela kwiinkqubo zoqeqesho ezibanzi kuwo onke amashishini, kubandakanya ukwakha, imveliso, kunye nemfundo. Khetha uqeqesho lokuqalisa, iikhosi ezithile zendima, kunye nokunye, konke kuhambelana nemithetho ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika.
services.audits.title: Uhlolo & Uvavanyo
services.audits.description: Qinisekisa ukuba indawo yakho yokusebenza iyahlangabezana nemigangatho ye-OHS ngeenkonzo zethu zokuhlola kunye novavanyo. Izixhobo zethu zikunceda uqhube ukuhlola okucokisekileyo, uvelise iingxelo, kwaye uphumeze izenzo zokulungisa.
services.risk_management.title: Izicwangciso zoLawulo loMngcipheko
services.risk_management.description: Yenza izicwangciso zolawulo lomngcipheko (RMPs) ezilungiselelwe ezibandakanya umthetho waseMzantsi Afrika, imithetho yomasipala, kunye nemigangatho yamazwe ngamazwe efana ne-ISO 45001, eqinisekisa ukuba ishishini lakho lilungiselele nayiphi na ingozi.
services.support.title: Inkxaso & Izixhobo Zoluntu
services.support.description: Joyina uluntu lwethu ukuze uxele iziganeko, ufikelele kwiilisti zokhuseleko zeevenkile zespaza, izikolo, kunye neetavern, kwaye uqhagamshelane nabanye abachwephesha be-OHS ukuze ufumane inkxaso kunye nentsebenziswano.
training.title: Uqeqesho Olubanzi Lwendawo Yomsebenzi
training.description: Phonononga iinkqubo zethu zoqeqesho ezibanzi zendawo yomsebenzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela imithetho ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika kunye nokukhuthaza indawo yokusebenza ekhuselekileyo. Khetha uqeqesho lwezandla, uqeqesho lweqela, okanye sebenzisa iwizadi yethu ukuze ufumane iingcebiso ezilungiselelwe ishishini lakho, abaphulaphuli ekujoliswe kubo, kunye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Nceda khetha ukhetho ukuze uqalise inkqubo yengcebiso yoqeqesho.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwezi-5: Khetha iShishini Lakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: iShishini:

training.wizard.step_2.label: Abaphulaphuli Ekujoliswe Kubo (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Nceda khetha ubuncinane abaphulaphuli abakujoliswe kubo abanye.
training.wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwezi-5: Cacisa Indawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwezi-5: Iikhrayitheriya eZongeziweyo
training.wizard.step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwezi-5: Phonononga uQeqesho oluCetyiswayo
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kwigalelo lakho, nazi iinkqubo zoqeqesho ezicetyiswayo. Khetha ezifuna ukuzongeza kwi-cart yakho.
training.cart.title: I-Cart Yakho yoQeqesho
training.cart.customization.title: Lungisa Izinto Zakho zoQeqesho
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Nceda faka igama lomntu woncedo lokuqala.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Nceda faka inombolo yonxibelelwano kaxakeka esebenzayo (umzekelo, +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Iqulethwe Ngubani
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela yokuNika uQeqesho
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela yokuNika:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso se-SafetyHelp: Izinto zoqeqesho ezinikezelweyo zezenkcazelo kuphela kwaye aziboneleli ngengcebiso yobuchule. Ngezisombululo ze-OHS ezilungiselelwe wena, qhagamshelana ne-SafetyHelp ku support@safetyhelp.co.za okanye undwendwele Iphepha loNxibelelwano.
training.checkout.success: Intlawulo iphumelele! Izinto zakho zoqeqesho zivelisiwe. Khuphela ii-PDF zakho ngezantsi. Ngoqeqesho lwe-intanethi, iikhowudi zokufikelela zithunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyile.
training.providers.title: AbaNikezeli boQeqesho abaVunyiweyo
training.providers.description: Ngaba ufuna uqeqesho lobuqu? Qhagamshelana nabanikezeli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo kwiimfuno zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - SETA Evunyiweyo - Igxile kwi-First Aid, UkuCima uMlilo - Unxibelelwano: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - SACPCMP Ebhalisiweyo - Igxile kuKhuseleko loKwakha - Unxibelelwano: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Uqeqesho lwe-OHS Olubanzi - Unxibelelwano: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga iManuwali yoQeqesho eLungiselelweyo
training.manual.purchase.description: Fumana imanuwali yoqeqesho ebanzi elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, kubandakanya iimfuno zomthetho, umxholo owenziwe ngokweprofayile yakho yomngcipheko, kunye nezikowuti ezivela kubanikezeli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Cacisa iProfayile Yakho yoMngcipheko woQeqesho lweManuwali
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iprofayile yoMngcipheko:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho yoQeqesho
training.legal_fact.step_1: Inyaniso yoMthetho: Icandelo 8 loMthetho we-OHS lifuna abaqeshi banikeze uqeqesho olulungiselelwe iingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenza.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Inyaniso eMnandi: Ngaba uyazi ukuba uqeqesho oluqhelekileyo lunokunciphisa iziganeko zendawo yokusebenza ukuya kuthi ga kwi-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Inyaniso yoMthetho: Oomasipala basekhaya banokuba nemithetho ye-OHS eyahlukileyo echaphazela iimfuno zoqeqesho.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Inyaniso eMnandi: Iindawo zokusebenza ezinomngcipheko ophezulu ezifana neziza zokwakha zifuna uqeqesho oluqhelekileyo ukugcina imigangatho yokhuseleko.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Inyaniso yoMthetho: UMthetho we-OHS unyanzelisa uqeqesho oluthile kwiindima ezifana nabameli be-SHE ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela.

legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho yenziwe! Sebenzisa ikhowudi yevawutsha FREERMP2025 ukuze ukhuphele simahla (abasebenzisi abangu-100 bokuqala).
suppliers.title: Uluhlu lwaBanikezeli be-OHS
suppliers.description: Fumana kwaye ubeke abanikezeli be-OHS eMzantsi Afrika. Khetha ngokwendawo, iinkonzo, kunye nezivunyiweyo. Ngenisa uphononongo ukunceda abanye benze izigqibo ezinolwazi.

suppliers.table.name: Igama loMniki
suppliers.review_form.title: Ngenisa Uphononongo
community_tools.title: Izixhobo zoKhuseleko loLuntu
community_tools.description: Xela nasiphi na isiganeko sokhuseleko okanye ingozi kuluntu lwakho okanye kwindawo yakho yokusebenza, ukusuka kwimingxuma ukuya kwizixhobo ezineziphene. Sebenzisa izixhobo zethu ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko kwiindawo ezifana neevenkile zespaza, izikolo, izibhedlele, kunye neetavern.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Xela Isiganeko okanye Ingozi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza isiganeko okanye ingozi (umz., imingxuma kuMain Street, isitulo esaphukileyo kwiziko loluntu)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Isiphathi Sakho seMidiya yoLuntu (Ngokuzikhethela, umz., @username kwi-X):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka ifowuni okanye i-imeyile (igcwalisiwe ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umnikezeli ukhethiwe)...
Isiphathi seMidiya yoLuntu soMnikezeli weNkonzo (Ngokuzikhethela, umz., @CityofJoburgZA kwi-X):
